In England, in the seven days to 03 February, there were 512,254 new confirmed cases (905.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 January, there were 619,155 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (106,901 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 February is 15,389,601 (27,214.1 cases per 100,000 population).
